channel.title: Adding NPCs that you can attack!
channel.description: I need some help with adding NPCs in my server. Can someone explain this to me? I have him placed there already and stuff, but as soon as I attack him, i hit 0 and it dies. (It's a Jad =]) How do i give it HP? Thanks!

item.title: Adding NPCs that you can attack!
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

go to npc.cfg and add htis to the bottom

npc = 2745	Jad			702	100

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

well, change public NPCList(int _npcId){ to this

npcId = _npcId; if(npcName == "TzTok-Jad"){ npcHealth = 360; }

Read full topic
item.source: Adding NPCs that you can attack!

item.title: Adding NPCs that you can attack!
item.dc:creator: @harnum721 harnum721
item.description:
@harnum721 wrote:

public class NPCList {
public int npcId;
public String npcName;
public int npcCombat;
public int npcHealth;

public NPCList(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
}

}

^ thats in my npc list

Read full topic
